channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 08:24 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 08:24 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #m_Marhanets_and_the_Marhanets_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:20 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further updates.
item.description: 游릭 08:20 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further updates. #m_Marhanets_and_the_Marhanets_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:18 Alarm response in Zhytomyr region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:18 Alarm response in Zhytomyr region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Zhytomyr_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:18 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:18 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 08:17 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 游리 08:17 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 08:16 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Myriv territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 08:16 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Myriv territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_Oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
